contents.text: Two young people,an American and a japanese,are chatting as they wait to board their flight.
contents.text_zh: 两位年轻人，一位美国人和一位日本人，边等班机边闲聊。

contents.text: I see by your boarding card that we’re on the same fight.
contents.text_zh: 从登机牌上看，我们将乘同一趟航班。

contents.text: Oh really?I’m so happy to meet someone else on my flight—this is my first trip overseas.
contents.text_zh: 哦，真的吗？很高兴认识和我乘同一航班的朋友。这是我第一次去海外旅游。

contents.text: Then you’ve never been to the United States. Are you going there to study or just for sightseeing?
contents.text_zh: 这么说你从来没有去过美国。是去学习还是去观光。

contents.text: I’ll be studying tourism management for two years at private institute for foreigners.
contents.text_zh: 我将去一所私立学校学两年旅游管理。

contents.text: That’s great.Oh,by the way,I’m John Smith.I’m returning home to New York City after a two-week vacation here in Tokyo.
contents.text_zh: 太好了！哦，告诉你，我叫约翰.史密斯。我在东京度过了两周的假期，现在回纽约的家。

contents.text: Was it your first trip to Japan?
Oh no,I’ve been here three times. I have friends living in Tokyo.
contents.text_zh: 哦，不是，我已经去过3次了，我有朋友住在东京。

contents.text: Speaking of friends,I think I’d better find the tax-free shop before we board the plane.I’d like to buy some gifts for the people who will be meeting me at the airport.
contents.text_zh: 说起朋友，我想在上飞机前，最好找家免税店，我想送些礼物给去机场接我的朋友。

contents.text: The shop is over there in the corner —I’ll watch your things for you while you look around.
contents.text_zh: 免税店就在那边的角落里—你去瞧瞧，我帮你看行李。

contents.text: Thanks,I’d appreciate that.Do I have much time?
contents.text_zh: 谢谢，非常感谢。我的时间够吗？

contents.text: Yes I just looked at the board—they should be announcing our flight in about 30 minutes.
contents.text_zh: 够了，我刚才看了登机布告栏—大约30分钟以后，他们才宣布登机。
